About the FriarBot\'s Android Application and some settings
An accurate keeping of the changes of this application and their corresponding version numbers.
An great place to keep track of the upcoming events.

The FriarBots application was made to simplify and unify all the team\'s information in one easy place. From Scouting information to weekly updates accessible for the whole team. We also made this application for parents, who want an easy way to follow what their sons and daughters are doing in the world of robotics.
